QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Uvulopalatopharyngoplasty (UPPP)
QAPair.Answer: Uvulopalatopharyngoplasty (UPPP) is surgery to open the upper airways by taking out extra tissue in the throat. It may be done alone to treat mild obstructive sleep apnea or snoring or with other procedures to treat moderate obstructive sleep apnea (OSA).
